snippet: No one on board was hurt during the minute-long dive, but the flight to Rome was sent back to Belgrade.
abstract: Serbian officials confirm that government plane carrying Pres Tomislav Nikolic experienced 60-second plunge after engine failed, leading to cancellation of meeting with Pope Francis.
lead_paragraph: No one on board was hurt during the minute-long dive, but the flight to Rome was sent back to Belgrade.

headline.main: Serbian President’s Plane Takes Harrowing Plunge
headline.print_headline: Serbian President’s Plane Takes Harrowing Plunge
